A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Of the total of 150 minutes only 30 minutes had cool action\, and the rest of 120 minutes was nothing more than worthless chitchat. At times\, and there were many of these\, they showed close-ups of the actors' faces\, flipping between the \"Good and the Bad\" sides\, just as in cheap Italo-western movies of the seventies. Really ridiculous for the year 2017. 3/10 points.
